meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a hippie.
meanings.sent1: Her hippieness was evident in her love for peace and nature.
meanings.sent2: The festival was full of hippieness, with people dancing freely and spreading positivity.
meanings.sent3: The hippieness of the group was contagious, making everyone feel more relaxed and carefree.
meanings.sent4: In the midst of chaos, her hippieness shone like a beacon of calm and harmony.
meanings.sent5: The hippieness of the garden was so strong that even the flowers seemed to sway to the rhythm of a peaceful song.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of embodying the values and lifestyle associated with the hippie movement.
meanings.sent1: His hippieness was reflected in his tie-dye shirts and love for nature.
meanings.sent2: The town had a vibe of hippieness, with its organic cafes and art galleries.
meanings.sent3: The hippieness of the party was evident in the colorful decorations and laid-back atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: She exuded a sense of hippieness that made others feel more connected to the earth.
meanings.sent5: The hippieness of the community was so strong that even the most uptight visitors felt a sense of peace and acceptance.
